overview: Ed Brill is Director, End-User Messaging and Collaboration, IBM Lotus software. In this position, Brill and his team are responsible for the product and market strategy for Lotus Notes and Lotus iNotes, market-leading collaborative software, Lotus Symphony, a no-charge, complete office productivity solution, and other related Lotus-branded software solutions. Brill’s focus is on increasing IBM’s success from the perspective of end-user collaboration software, working with customers, business partners, and IBM sales, marketing, and product development organizations.
